company: PT KAI Indonesia (Persero) Daop IV Semarang
description: During my internship at PT KAI Indonesia (Persero) Daop IV Semarang, I actively assisted the team in maintaining operational electronic equipment. My responsibilities included documenting and reporting the results of regular inspections in a structured manner. I was also directly involved in checking electrical components and ensuring safety supervision. This experience strengthened my technical skills and discipline in an industrial work environment.
